blogPost.excerpt: Instantly create photo-real avatars of friends, family, celebrities, paintings, by using any photo with a face! In one click, make them sing, say anything you want, puppet their face like you an Animoji. Check out our new holiday backgrounds too!
blogPost.body: Instantly create photo-real avatars of friends, family, celebrities, paintings, by using any photo with a face! In one click, make them sing, say anything you want, puppet their face like you an Animoji. Check out our new holiday backgrounds too!
blogPost.title: Tokkingheads by Rosebud - Instantly animate a portrait photo w/ text, speech, or video
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 即时创建照片真实的化身的朋友，家人，名人，绘画，通过使用任何照片与一张脸！只需点击一下，就可以让他们唱歌，说任何你想说的话，把他们的脸伪装成你是一个阿尼莫吉。也来看看我们新的假期背景吧！
localize.tagline: 使用文本、语音或视频即时制作肖像照片动画

localize.description: 即時創建照片真實的化身的朋友，家人，名人，繪畫，通過使用任何照片與一張臉！只需點擊一下，就可以讓他們唱歌，說任何你想說的話，把他們的臉僞裝成你是一個阿尼莫吉。也來看看我們新的假期背景吧！
localize.tagline: 使用文本、語音或視頻即時製作肖像照片動畫

previous.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.
previous.title: PC Builder - Custom PC part picker tool to build your PC

localize.description: PC Builder是一个网站，帮助人们创建兼容的PC部件列表，而不会遇到任何兼容性问题。这个网站是以初学者为中心创建的，其主要目标是让每个人都能轻松兼容。
localize.tagline: 用于构建PC的自定义PC部件选取器工具

localize.description: PC Builder是一個網站，幫助人們創建兼容的PC部件列表，而不會遇到任何兼容性問題。這個網站是以初學者爲中心創建的，其主要目標是讓每個人都能輕鬆兼容。
localize.tagline: 用於構建PC的自定義PC部件選取器工具

next.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
next.title: 1Question - Turning your child's screen time into study time!

localize.description: 在给孩子们访问他们最喜欢的应用程序之前，问题会问一个快速学习的问题……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕里！1Query不是完全的限制，而是为孩子们创造了无限的机会，让他们在游戏中学习。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看电视的时间变成学习时间！

localize.description: 在給孩子們訪問他們最喜歡的應用程序之前，問題會問一個快速學習的問題……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕裏！1Query不是完全的限制，而是爲孩子們創造了無限的機會，讓他們在遊戲中學習。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看電視的時間變成學習時間！
